mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(video_code),0)+1 FROM video
INSERT INTO video (video_code,video_name, video_content, video_hit, video_reg_date, VIDEO_REGION, url,thumbnail )
VALUES (#{videoCode},#{videoName},#{videoContent}, 0, sysdate,#{videoRegion},#{url},#{thumbnail})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM VIDEO where video_code = #{videoCode}
select count(*) from video
